name: Multitasking
description:
You need an controller to play this Prototype.

You only need to read the tutorial, if you´re not German, otherwise you can watch the introduction video for the gppcc12. 

In this Prototype you controll 2 characters at once. The triangle and the square.

You need to get both characters to the other side of the level simultaneously.

But watch out. You only have an specific time to finish the level.

You controll the triangle with the right side of the controller. With the right joystick you can move the triangle in 8 directions. The triangle moves automatically. But it can move faster by pressing RT and it can move slower by pressing RB. If the triangle hits the wall, the level restarts automatically.

You control the cube with the left side of the controller. It´s like an normal jump´n Run Character, so its affected by Gravity. You can move left or right with the left joystick and you can jump by pressing LB.
